description: Source file defining NotesRepository class that provides data access methods for Note entities using Room database components.

classes.name: NotesRepository
classes.description: Repository for notes providing an abstraction layer over the Room database for Note entities.

methods.name: observeNotes
methods.description: Returns a LiveData list of all notes from the database.

methods.name: searchNotes
methods.description: Returns a LiveData list of notes matching the search query.

methods.name: getNote
methods.description: Suspending function to retrieve a note by its ID.

methods.name: saveNote
methods.description: Suspending function to insert or update a note in the database.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Suspending function to delete a note from the database.
